channel.title: Ramzan Kadyrov on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Ramzan Kadyrov on Rusland 1

item.title: НАИВ – Heroes of Our Time
item.description: Antihero(es) Just as the protagonist Pechorin is no hero at all, НАИВ also features characters far from any heroic roles. They can be seen in the video, and two are mentioned by name in the lyrics. The смелый вождь (brave leader) can only be Putin.
